<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/migration/init/{migratorName}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Uploads and initializes a migration with a migrator name specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"migratorName","in":"path","description":"The migrator name extracted from the route parameters.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"some text"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
